arts.ttl: Blackburn's Owen Beck allegedly bitten in clash with Preston
arts.sum: “He (Beck) went to clear the ball and caught the lad, but he’s got a big bite mark on the back of his neck. Blackburn player Owen Beck was allegedly bitten in his team’s ill-tempered local derby with Preston on Sunday, his manager John Eustace said.

arts.ttl: Preston forward Milutin Osmajic appears to BITE Blackburn's Owen Beck on the neck in shocking scenes in Lancashire derby
arts.sum: Preston forward Milutin Osmajic could be set for a lengthy ban from football after appearing to bite Blackburn defender Owen Beck (left) on the neck during the Lancashire derby.

arts.ttl: Blackburn star accuses Preston man of BITING him during feisty Lancashire derby
arts.sum: Owen Beck was sent off for a dangerous challenge on Duane Holmes that saw him lunge out and catch the American - with the incident resulting in a melee between both teams before Milutin Osmajic grabbed the defender

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers player ratings: Aynsley Pears and defence impress
arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers kept another clean sheet but couldn't find a way through Preston North End

arts.ttl: 'Angry' - Blackburn Rovers verdict after Owen Beck bite incident
arts.sum: The Blackburn Rovers loanee was bitten on the neck by Preston North End's Milutin Osmajic

arts.ttl: Liverpool loanee sent off after being BITTEN by opponent – “I’ve got a bite mark!”
arts.sum: In an extraordinary turn of events, Liverpool loanee Owen Beck was sent off for Blackburn after being bitten by Preston’s Milutin Osmajic in their 0-0 draw. Osmajic took exception to this in an extreme way, approaching Beck from behind and biting him on the neck.

arts.ttl: Biting allegation as two see red in fiery draw between Preston and Blackburn
arts.sum: Sam Greenwood and Owen Beck were both sent off as Preston and Blackburn drew 0-0 in a feisty Championship Lancashire derby.

arts.ttl: Preston and Blackburn share spoils in controversial goalless draw
arts.sum: Sam Greenwood and Owen Beck were sent off, with the latter accusing Milutin Osmajic of biting him in the aftermath.

arts.ttl: Two red cards as Blackburn Rovers left frustrated with Preston North End draw
arts.sum: The game ended goalless at Deepdale as the two teams ended with ten men

arts.ttl: Preston North End vs Blackburn Rovers LIVE: Score updates from Deepdale
arts.sum: Live updates, analysis and reaction from Deepdale as Blackburn Rovers take on Preston North End
